Willmore Dog Park.Description: Large area with a beautiful dog park, ponds, picnic spots, and play areas.

Central Park Maplewood.Description: This is a membership only dog park!  Memberships are annual and must be renewed each year.

SLU Dog Park & Sculpture Garden.Description: A beautiful park with great sculptures and lots of space for your pup to run and play!
SLU Dog Park & Sculpture Garden.Address: 1 N. Grand Blvd, St. Louis, MO 63103

Bar K St. Louis.Description: A pup friendly bar that has food, drinks, and hosts local events for you and your pup!

Zoomies Pet Cafe + Boutique.Description: Good food, good coffee, fun pup treats and trinkets in the boutique, and a fun outdoor area for the pups to play while you relax!

Rockwell Beer Garden.Description: Pizza, pups, and pints!  All located in wonderful Francis Park!
